potionEffect.description:
potionEffect
The potion effect to apply in this area
   
Text

    
* Default Value is

strength.description:
strength
The Potion Strength or -1 to disable
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is -1
* Minimum allowed is -1
* Maximum allowed is 1024

ticks.description:
ticks
The time the potion will last for
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 200
* Minimum allowed is 1

ambient.description:
ambient
Is the effect ambient
   
Boolean

    
* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)

particles.description:
particles
Is the effect showing particles
   
Boolean

    
* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)
